adjectives.description: perjink (comparative more perjink, superlative most perjink)

entries.meaning: (Scotland) Meticulously neat and precise; prim or finicky.
examples: All my things were kept by her in a most perjink and excellent order, but they soon fell into an amazing confusion, for, as she often said to me, I had a turn for heedlessness; [â€¦] .
